pr_title: Permits to also use the AdditionalRolesProvider to extend Tenant::has…

timeline.message:
Permits to also use the AdditionalRolesProvider to extend Tenant::hasPermission.

This is mainly useful to toggle / provide some feature flags so that the role to permission
maps can filter on these and only show useful roles for a user based on its tenants
capabilities.
